name: Plane Noir
description:
Plane Noir is a game about trying to solve what happened at a crash site but in a reversed way.

It follows the story of Jonathan Dixon, an agent of the Association of World Watchers. Dixon wakes up in the middle of the site, unaware of exactly how he got there and the events leading up to the crash. As he begins to piece together holes in his memories the environment around him shifts and changes. He moves through each memory putting together more of the crime, and solving what got him there.

Credits Designers

Natasha Shabir
Thomas Bulle

Programmer/Systems Designer
